channel.title: Green_software on CEDIS
channel.description: Recent content in Green_software on CEDIS

item.title: Green Software Development
item.description: The area of Green Software Development, or Sustainable Software Development, is an emerging field in software engineering focused on creating software with minimal environmental impact.

item.title: Green Software Development Project
item.description: This project aims to highlight the importance of understanding the field of Green Software Development and bringing it into companies.

item.title: Fabiana Freitas Mendes
